name: Coco AI
description: An open source unified search and productivity tool that searches, summarizes and organizes your digital information.

content.overview: Coco AI is an innovative open-source tool designed to unify search and productivity workflows. It intelligently searches, summarizes, and organizes your digital information across various sources, helping you quickly find what you need and make connections between different pieces of information. The tool aims to reduce information overload and enhance productivity by providing a single interface for accessing and processing diverse digital content.

features.title: Unified Search
features.description: Searches across multiple sources of digital information, providing a centralized access point

features.title: AI-Powered Summarization
features.description: Automatically generates concise summaries of documents, articles, and other content

features.title: Information Organization
features.description: Helps categorize and organize digital content for easier retrieval and connection-making

features.title: Cross-Platform Integration
features.description: Works across different platforms and devices to provide a consistent experience

features.title: Open-Source Architecture
features.description: Fully open-source design allows for community contributions and customizations

useCases.title: Research Assistance
useCases.description: Helps researchers quickly find, summarize, and organize information from multiple sources

useCases.title: Knowledge Management
useCases.description: Assists knowledge workers in maintaining and accessing their digital knowledge base

useCases.title: Content Creation
useCases.description: Supports content creators by providing quick access to reference materials and inspirations

useCases.title: Personal Information Management
useCases.description: Helps individuals organize and retrieve their personal digital information

advantages: Reduces time spent searching for information
Creates connections between disparate pieces of information
Privacy-focused design keeps your data secure

faqs.question: What types of information can Coco AI search through?
faqs.answer: Coco AI is designed to search through various types of digital information, including documents, web pages, notes, emails, and other text-based content depending on the integrations available.

faqs.question: Does Coco AI require internet access?
faqs.answer: While some features may require internet access, particularly for searching web-based content, many core functions can work locally with your stored information.

faqs.question: Is my data secure when using Coco AI?
faqs.answer: As an open-source tool, Coco AI is designed with privacy in mind. Your data remains under your control, and you can review the code to verify security practices.

faqs.question: Can I contribute to Coco AI's development?
faqs.answer: Yes, as an open-source project, Coco AI welcomes contributions from the community. You can contribute code, report issues, or suggest improvements through the GitHub repository.
